title: Labor Is Winning? Disney Is The New Mask Mandate 4.11.22
itunes:title: Labor Is Winning? Disney Is The New Mask Mandate 4.11.22
description:
In episode 1223, Miles and guest co-host Jacquis Neal are joined by journalist Aymann Ismail to discuss… Biden maybe did a good thing for labor…kinda, Disney has replaced mask mandates I guess…, Devin Nunes’ sounds like that kid from high school that can’t stop lying, Coke’s New Flavors Are Getting Increasingly Confusing and more!

  1. Biden maybe did a good thing for labor…kinda
  2. Disney has replaced mask mandates I guess…
  3. Two key tech execs quit Truth Social after troubled app launch
  4. Coke’s New Flavors Are Getting Increasingly Confusing

  5. The Internet Is Baffled By Coca-Cola's New Starlight Flavor

  6. Coke's latest flavor is here. And it's a weird one

READ: slate.com/author/aymann-ismail

LISTEN: Neck & Wrist (feat. Jay-Z and Pharrell Williams) by Pusha T

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
